mapper.select: SELECT log.logid , de.deptname , u.username ,log.use_module as usemodule, log.use_operation as useoperation,log.use_ip as useip,log.use_time as usetime FROM log_use log LEFT JOIN sys_dept de ON de.deptid = log.deptid LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.userid = log.userid WHERE log.LOGID=#{value}
select count(1) from log_use log left join sys_dept de on de.deptid = log.deptid left join sys_user u on u.userid = log.userid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO log_use (logid , deptid , userid,use_time,use_module, use_operation,use_describle,use_ip) values(#{logid}, #{deptid}, #{userid}, cast('2014-12-29' as datetime),'测试模块', '测试功能','测试EXCEL导入', '127.0.0.1' )
